actions.name: Anger Shell

cost.trigger: An attack is resolved against the user and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

actions.description:
Trigger: An attack is resolved against the user and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

Effect: The user gains +1 ATK, SPATK, and SPD Stages and loses -1 DEF and SPDEF Stages for 5 Activations.

system.description:
Trigger: The user drops below 50% HP due to damage from a Physical- or Special-Category Attack.

Effect: The user gains +1 ATK, SPATK, and SPD Stages and loses -1 DEF and SPDEF Stages for 5 Activations.
